type: Replacement of Floating Wharves, Eastside - Toney River, Nova Scotia
short_summary: Replacement or Floating Wharves at the Toney River in Nova Scotia
description: The work covered under this contract consists of the furnishing of all plant, labour, equipment and material for the replacement of Floating Wharves at Toney River, Pictou County, Nova Scotia. :Duration of contract:\
